documentation.title: KoolDateTimePicker-ClientEvents [Javascript]
documentation.metakeywords: php calendar,php ajax calendar,php date picker,php date time picker
documentation.metadescription: KoolCalendar is excellent PHP Calendar control that is features-rich, easy to integrate to web sites and simple to customize. Combining DatePicker and TimePicker, KoolCalendar offers special features like Ajax Capability, Multi-view, Quick month selection, etc. Last but not least, its revolutionary rendering using CSS sprites skyrockets its loading time.

property.name: OnBeforeDatePickerOpen
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$datetimepicker->ClientEvents["OnBeforeDatePickerOpen"] = "Handle_OnBeforeDatePickerOpen";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnBeforeDatePickerOpen(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Date picker is about to open");
		return true; // Approve action
	}
</script>

property.name: OnDatePickerOpen
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$datetimepicker->ClientEvents["OnDatePickerOpen"] = "Handle_OnDatePickerOpen";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnDatePickerOpen(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Date picker opens.");
	}
</script>

property.name: OnSelect
property.shortdesc: Occur when date or time is selected.
property.longdesc: Occur when date or time is selected.
property.samplecode:
<?php
...
	$datetimepicker->ClientEvents["OnSelect"] = "Handle_OnSelect";
...
?>
...
<script type="text/javacript">
	function Handle_OnSelect(sender,args)
	{
		alert("Datetime is selected.");
	}
</script>
